name: GAI Stops Auto: Right Version Simulator
name_original: GAI Stops Auto: Right Version Simulator
description:
In the GAI Stops Auto you will become a traffic police officer. Stop cars and check for violations. You can communicate with drivers in different ways. Write out fines for drivers or take a bribe - it's up to you.

Events

Sometimes unpredictable events will occur around you. You must be willing to overcome them. Watch out for the police boss. Beware of wild muscular guys and animals! Explore the space around. Find secret objects.


Story

Complete the missions and go through the story of a police officer. Reach the end and find out how it all ends!


Features

  • Car traffic system
  • Dialogs
  • Epic story
  • Meme characters
  • Fun events
